channel.title: New search engine, can it even side google?
channel.description:
Hi so here is the link for it: http://www.slashmysearch.com/
I have used it for about a week and this one is really good, made me wonder about this:
Test it and say what you think i think it wins Google. :D
EDIT:I respect google very much still.

item.title: New search engine, can it even side google?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Slash My Search is a brand new search engine that is designed to get you the best results out there on the internet quickly and effectively. Using our proprietary algorithms, we are able to "slash" through more of the junk and find you the most relevant results. We filter results from Yahoo, AltaVista, Excite, the Google search engine, our databases and several other sources. We also track what results are visited the most and refine our database with that information.
You're getting less results because it "Slash's" your search. Apparently, only gets the best results.

Read full topic
item.source: New search engine, can it even side google?

SlashMySearch = 10 paid adds

Google = Results 1 - 10 of about 23,400,000 for .flair

item.title: New search engine, can it even side google?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I majorly prefer google.

see:
with slashmysearch:

Search Results for davidude36

We are sorry there were no search results found for davidude36
Please Try Again.

with google:

Results 1 - 10 of about 244 for davidude36.

Not to mention i find it much easier to type www.google.co.uk then www.slashmysearch.com

Read full topic
